009package imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.geometric;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.isZero;
012import static java.lang.Math.hypot;
013import static org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresFactory.evaluationChecker;
014
015import java.util.LinkedList;
016import java.util.List;
017
018import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresFactory;
019import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresOptimizer;
020import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresOptimizer.Optimum;
021import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresProblem;
022import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer;
023import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.MultivariateJacobianFunction;
024import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.Array2DRowRealMatrix;
025import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.ArrayRealVector;
026import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix;
027import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector;
028import org.apache.commons.math3.optim.SimpleVectorValueChecker;
029import org.apache.commons.math3.util.Pair;
030
031import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
032import imagingbook.common.geometry.circle.GeometricCircle;
033
034/**
035 * "Distance-based" geometric circle fitter using a
036 * Levenberg-Marquart optimizer.
037 * 
038 * @author WB
039 *
040 */
041public class CircleFitGeometricDist implements CircleFitGeometric {
042        
043        private final Pnt2d[] pts;
044        private final double[] V;
045        private final double[][] J;
046        private final Optimum solution;
047        private final List<double[]> history = new LinkedList<>();
048        
049        public CircleFitGeometricDist(Pnt2d[] pts, GeometricCircle initCircle) {
050                this(pts, initCircle, DefaultMaxIterations, DefaultMaxIterations, DefaultTolerance);
051        }
052        
053        public CircleFitGeometricDist(Pnt2d[] pts, GeometricCircle initCircle, int maxEvaluations, int maxIterations, double tolerance) {
054                this.pts = pts;
055                this.V = new double[pts.length];
056                this.J = new double[pts.length][3];
057                
058                LeastSquaresProblem problem = 
059                                LeastSquaresFactory.create(
060                                        new AnalyticModel(), // model(V, J), 
061                                        new ArrayRealVector(pts.length),                // zero vector
062                                        new ArrayRealVector(initCircle.getParameters()),
063                                        evaluationChecker(new SimpleVectorValueChecker(tolerance, tolerance)),
064                                        maxEvaluations, maxIterations);
065                
066                LeastSquaresOptimizer optimizer = new LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer();    // new GaussNewtonOptimizer();  
067                this.solution = optimizer.optimize(problem);
068        }
069        
070
071        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
072
073        @Override
074        public double[] getParameters() {
075                return solution.getPoint().toArray();
076        }
077        
078        @Override
079        public int getIterations() {
080                return solution.getIterations();
081        }
082        
083        @Override
084        public List<double[]> getHistory() {
085                return history;
086        }
087        
088        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
089    
090    /**
091     * Defines function {@link #value(RealVector)} which returns
092     * the vector of model values and the associated Jacobian matrix
093     * for a given parameter point.
094     */
095    class AnalyticModel implements MultivariateJacobianFunction {
096
097                @Override
098                public Pair<RealVector, RealMatrix> value(RealVector point) {
099                        final double[] p = point.toArray();
100                        if (RecordHistory) {
101                                history.add(p.clone());
102                        }
103                        
104                        final double xc = p[0], yc = p[1], r  = p[2];
105                        for (int i = 0; i < pts.length; i++) {
106                                double dx = xc - pts[i].getX();
107                                double dy = yc - pts[i].getY();
108                                double ri = hypot(dx, dy);
109                                
110                                // values:
111                                V[i] = ri - r;
112                                
113                                // Jacobian:
114                                if (isZero(ri)) {       // (xi,yi) is at the circle center
115                                        J[i][0] = 0;    // (xc - xi) = 0 too
116                                        J[i][1] = 0;    // (yc - yi) = 0 too
117                                } else {
118                                        J[i][0] = dx / ri;
119                                        J[i][1] = dy / ri;
120                                }
121                                J[i][2] = -1;
122                        }
123                        RealVector VV = new ArrayRealVector(V, false);
124                        RealMatrix JJ = new Array2DRowRealMatrix(J, false);
125                        return new Pair<>(VV, JJ);
126                }
127        
128    }
129    
130    
131    
132    // -------------------------------------------------------------------
133

178}
